characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: In each of your Shooting phases, choose one of the following effects:  Targeting Data Skull: Add 1 to hit rolls made for a single friendly BLOOD ANGELS unit within 12" of this model until the end of the phase.  Repair Skull: Choose a single BLOOD ANGELS VEHICLE within 12" of this model. That model regains 1 lost wound.  Vox Skull: Subtract 1 from morale tests taken for friendly BLOOD ANGELS units within 12" of this model until your next Shooting phase.
